statements: SELECT * FROM OccupancyLevels WHERE route_id = 123;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, occupancy FROM OccupancyLevels WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT vehicle_id, occupancy FROM OccupancyLevels WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, occupancy FROM OccupancyLevels ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT route_id, AVG(occupancy) AS average_occupancy FROM OccupancyLevels GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, occupancy, timestamp FROM OccupancyLevels WHERE route_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM OccupancyLevels WHERE occupancy > 50 AND vehicle_type = 'Bus' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, occupancy FROM OccupancyLevels WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY occupancy DESC
SELECT route_id, MAX(occupancy) AS max_occupancy FROM OccupancyLevels GROUP BY route_id HAVING MAX(occupancy) > 70
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_type FROM OccupancyLevels ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC
SELECT * FROM BusOccupancy WHERE occupancy_level > 50;
SELECT bus_id, occupancy_level FROM BusOccupancy WHERE bus_id = 3;
SELECT train_id FROM TrainOccupancy WHERE occupancy_level < 20;
SELECT * FROM TrainOccupancy ORDER BY train_id DESC;
SELECT bus_id, occupancy_level FROM BusOccupancy WHERE occupancy_level BETWEEN 30 AND 70;
SELECT * FROM BusOccupancy WHERE occupancy_level > 50 ORDER BY bus_id DESC;
SELECT bus_id, MAX(occupancy_level) AS max_occupancy FROM BusOccupancy GROUP BY bus_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT bus_id, train_id FROM BusOccupancy bo JOIN TrainOccupancy to ON bo.occupancy_level = to.occupancy_level;
SELECT bus_id, AVG(occupancy_level) AS avg_occupancy FROM BusOccupancy GROUP BY bus_id HAVING AVG(occupancy_level) > 30;
SELECT bus_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM BusOccupancy WHERE occupancy_level BETWEEN 30 AND 60 GROUP BY bus_id ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM buses;
SELECT bus_id, bus_route FROM buses WHERE occupancy_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM trains ORDER BY occupancy_level DESC;
SELECT train_route, occupancy_level FROM trains WHERE train_id = 3;
SELECT route_id, route_type, average_passengers FROM routes WHERE route_type = 'Express';
SELECT * FROM buses WHERE occupancy_level > 50;
SELECT bus_id, bus_route FROM buses WHERE bus_route LIKE 'A%';
SELECT train_id, train_route, occupancy_level FROM trains ORDER BY occupancy_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_type = 'Metro' OR route_type = 'Subway';
SELECT route_id, route_type, average_passengers FROM routes WHERE average_passengers > 100 ORDER BY average_passengers ASC;
SELECT * FROM bus_occupancy;
SELECT bus_id, occupancy FROM bus_occupancy WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM bus_routes WHERE route_id = 2;
SELECT MAX(occupancy) FROM bus_occupancy;
SELECT train_id, occupancy, route_id FROM train_occupancy WHERE occupancy > 50;
SELECT * FROM bus_occupancy WHERE occupancy > 50 ORDER BY bus_id ASC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM bus_routes WHERE route_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT train_id, occupancy FROM train_occupancy WHERE train_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY occupancy DESC, train_id ASC;
SELECT bus_id, occupancy, route_id FROM bus_occupancy WHERE route_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY bus_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM train_routes WHERE start_location = 'Station X' AND end_location = 'Station Y';
SELECT * FROM BusOccupancy;
SELECT train_id, occupancy_level FROM TrainOccupancy;
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM BusRoutes WHERE distance_km > 50;
SELECT * FROM TrainRoutes ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT passenger_id, route_id, passenger_count FROM PassengerDemands WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM BusOccupancy WHERE occupancy_level > 50 ORDER BY bus_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_trains FROM TrainOccupancy WHERE occupancy_level < 30;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM BusRoutes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT train_id, occupancy_level FROM TrainOccupancy JOIN TrainRoutes ON TrainOccupancy.train_id = TrainRoutes.route_id WHERE occupancy_level BETWEEN 20 AND 50;

SELECT PassengerDemands.passenger_id, route_id, timestamp, passenger_count, start_location, end_location FROM PassengerDemands JOIN TrainRoutes ON PassengerDemands.route_id = TrainRoutes.route_id WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
